name: Galaxy Shooter 3D - Alpha
description:
Two game modes
Aliens: 
Kill all enemy ships, pass levels, beat Bosses to unlock new ships and become stronger.
Asteroids:
Destroy asteroids in space, collect materials, sell them to buy more ships, to upgrade or refine them (crafting coming soon)
